argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the word was found; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: word
argument.description: The word to find within Search_In_String.

page.description: Find a case insensitive word (word of words) in text - if found, return true, else return false.
page.discussion: The *WORDI() function scans the character Search_In_String and returns TRUE if the Find_String can be found in it. A word is any sequence of characters separated on either end by spaces, punctuation marks, or the beginning or end of the field. Case insensitive.
